TopicTitle: Where do I talk about problems with the Kerbalizer?

Articles.Content: I'm having issues with the Kerbalizer and I am not sure where is the right place to talk about it.

The right place may end up being the Google Chrome bug tracker, as Google is ending support for NPAPI plugins such as the Unity player, meaning that NPAPI content will only work on older versions of Chrome that still have plugin support.

This means Unity (and others) will have to replace their plugin by targeting WebGL directly, which will be built into most newer browsers.

Until this is available it is not possible to update the Kerbalizer, sorry.

Well, I'm using Firefox. But I hope the Kerbalizer gets fixed soon since I spent the two bucks. I'd hate to think I wasted the money.

Edited November 3, 2015 by thesmokindeist
Need to learn how ro spell...sheesh...
